des:
SOOTHING SOUNDS IS BACK!!!

Enjoy a relaxing moment with the best samba music. Perfect for dinners, parties, whatever.

SOUND REQUESTS: 

Want us to add new sound skills for you? Please email us at deliveryprocharlesmerlo@gmail.com! 

REVIEWS: Please leave a 5-star review if you like this Skill and comment with your suggestions. 
Your 5-star reviews encourage us to improve this skill and to keep making more great skills! 

For a full list of skills, search for "CMM TECH REBOOTED" in the Alexa smartphone app or Amazon.com. 

ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS: The Icon is AI generated from ChatGPT.

Music from Open Door Samba by The Phil Chester Group.
